metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3096 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The create_script function in the lxc_container module in Ansible before1.9.6-1 and 2.x before 2.0.2.0 allows local users to write to arbitraryfiles or gain privileges via a symlink attack on (1)/opt/.lxc-attach-script, (2) the archived container in the archive_pathdirectory, or the (3) lxc-attach-script.log or (4) lxc-attach-script.errfiles in the temporary directory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3096` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 2.0.0.2-2ubuntu1.3
ansible-fireball - 2.0.0.2-2ubuntu1.3
ansible-node-fireball - 2.0.0.2-2ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ansible package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.0.2-2ubuntu1.3').
